text:
Hi [redacted_name], whenever you want we can go. We need your muscles üí™
John brought back tires that are in the boot of the car and is wondering please if you would mind putting them in the basement somewhere.
Thank you, I can help you if you like , maybe roll them down the ramp on her side would be the easiest.
I also have a chair up here to go down ü•∞
No rush as we can work around when you want to talk to your mom
